commentary_text: KICKOFF:  We're off. France get us started. Let's hope for an absolute cracker here.
Decent start from France here. The Blues are on the front foot, with Portugal having to sit deep in the early exchanges. Griezmann is playing as the 10, as expected.

Little bit of possession from Portugal in the last couple of minutes. Martinez's side will be looking to settle into this contest. Ronaldo has an early touch and zips a pass into the feet of Mendes, who advances down the left. It is worked into the France box, but the Blues stand strong and manage to force Portugal back.
France came out quickly, but Portugal have been on top in the last few minutes, working the ball from side to side in a bid to create space. France are sitting deep at the moment.

Leao and Mendes have been bright for Portugal in the early moments, and they again combine down the left, but France clear the danger. Portugal are the team dominating the ball at this moment in time.

Not too much from either Ronaldo or Mbappe thus far. Ronaldo has shown some nice touches, though, with the 39-year-old combining with teammates in dangerous positions. Portugal have just had a corner courtesy of a deflected Fernandes free kick, but France deal with the danger. Yet to really take off this game.
Leao releases Mendes with a brilliant flick down the France right, but the left-back's cross does not find a teammate.
Not too much happening at the moment in all honesty. I gave this one the big build-up, but it is yet to produce.
An error from Maignan leads to Portugal having a corner. Will it be costly?
The answer? No. Comfortable claim for the France goalkeeper.
SHOT!  Fernandes hits one from distance
line_type: and the ball deflects wide of the post.

commentary_text: Kolo Muani heads the Portugal corner clear. Cancelo against Mbappe is a very interesting battle in this match. Cancelo has just got the better of the France captain. Both players are absolutely lightening it must be said.
SAVE!  Smart save from Costa to keep out a long-range effort from Hernandez!

A bit better from France, but Portugal are back in control of the possession. No real chances for either side in the opening 22 minutes, but Portugal have been the superior outfit. Nothing from Mbappe yet tonight, famous last words.
And just like that, Mbappe bursts into life. He is down the left and delivers into the Portugal box, Costa palms it clear, and Portugal manage to clear their lines. First sign of Mbappe here.
Camavinga attempts to chip one into Hernandez inside the Portugal box, but he gets it wrong, and the ball goes behind for a goal kick. Still level with 24 played here.
France have the opportunity to threaten from a wide area, with Griezmann standing over a free kick, but his delivery is headed clear by Ronaldo.

I cannot speak from personal experience, but that mask must be really difficult to play in. It simply must have an impact on Mbappe's performances. Just the one piece of strong work from the Real Madrid attacker in the opening 28 minutes. Leao, though, has been very impressive for Portugal down the other end, with the forward just having a low cross cleared behind for another corner.
The corner was Portugal's fifth
line_type: but France deal with it through Saliba.

commentary_text: SHOT!  Mbappe just burst clear of Mendes, with France on the front foot, but Griezmann has a shot blocked by his own teammate before Hernandez hits one over from distance. Still goalless with little over 15 minutes of the first period remaining here.
Pass, pass, pass from Portugal. Leao is the one causing France problems - he just delivered another low cross into the France box, but Maignan is on hand to collect.
Pepe has just shown all of his experience to clear ahead of Griezmann, with France looking threatening. Portugal are then quickly down the other end and win a free kick.
Camavinga delivers a dangerous cross into Griezmann, but Fernandes is across to make the clearance. Good spell of possession for France in Portugal's half of the field.
France's first corner of the match is played short
I hope I'm wrong, as I want to see some goals, but I can easily see this match being 0-0 and going all the way to penalties. It is so tight at the moment.
Saliba has been excellent in the middle of the France defence tonight. He was probably the best centre-back in the Premier League last season.

Little over five minutes of the first period remaining, and we are goalless here. There has not been any serious chances for either side, just half-chances at absolute best. It is the match that I thought it would be. Nothing to choose between them.

It will be very interesting to see how Martinez uses Ronaldo tonight. Will he face a tough decision in the second period? Jota through the middle might work better for Portugal in this match, as Ronaldo has just not been in the contest so far.
Free kick for Portugal in a dangerous area as Kolo Muani fouls Vitinha...
SHOT!  ... Fernandes curls his free kick over the crossbar.
Ronaldo was standing behind Fernandes, but the Manchester United captain took the effort. It was decent, but Maignan was not overly concerned between the France sticks.
Not long left to play in the first period here, and we are all square.
HALF TIME:  PORTUGAL 0-0 FRANCE
KICKOFF:  Portugal get the second period underway here.

Vitinha has just burst clear for Portugal, but Camavinga is across to make a brilliant challenge. Excellent work from the Real Madrid midfielder, but the signs are positive - the tempo of the match is better at the start of the second period.
SAVE!  Portugal goalkeeper Costa keeps out an effort from Mbappe, with the France captain taking his shot early. Relatively comfortable save for the stopper, though.
PENALTY APPEAL!  Mendes goes down inside the France box, and looks at the referee, but Michael Oliver is not interested. It was a dive from the left-back. No contact from Upamecano.
Better from France as Hernandez gets forward and delivers a dangerous low cross into the Portugal box, but there are no takers in a blue shirt!
Mbappe is down holding his face, and his mask is off.
Mbappe is clearly in a lot of pain here, holding his nose. Replays have shown that a header from Bernardo hit him in the face. The play has been stopped here.
Mbappe is going to be fine here. His mask is off for now, but it will soon be back on, and the play will continue. Little over 30 minutes of normal time remaining here.
We are back underway. Mbappe has his mask back on. Little over 30 minutes of normal time remaining here, and the score is still level.
Which manager will blink first in terms of substitutes? There is so much talent on both benches. Leao has just broken into the France box, but Camavinga is across to make an excellent challenge.
SAVE!  Best moment of the match so far! Fernandes breaks into the France box, and his low strike is saved by goalkeeper Maignan! This is more like it.
SHOT!  Cancelo fires wide of the post moments after the Fernandes chance.
SHOT!  Goodness me. The less said about that shot from Tchouameni the better.

SAVE!  Here we go then! Brilliant save from Maignan again to keep out a close-range Vitinha effort, with the midfielder meeting a low cross from Leao. Maignan is then on hand to block Ronaldo's attempt.
France are wobbling here. It's all Portugal.
Portugal continue to threaten down the left, with Leao causing so many problems, and France are struggling to get out of their own half at the moment.
CLOSE!  WOW! Kolo Muani finds himself free inside the Portugal box and strikes towards goal, but Dias is across with a brilliant block, and it deflects behind!
FRANCE SUB! Ousmane Dembele replaces Griezmann.
Super block from Mendes on Mbappe after the France captain had worked some space in a wide area. This match is heating up very nicely indeed at the moment.
No movement on the Portugal bench at the moment. Martinez is holding firm.
CLOSE!  France! Camavinga collects the ball inside the Portugal box following a favourable deflection, but his effort is just wide of the far post!
France are coming on strong now, with Portugal just starting to look a little bit tired for the first time tonight. Martinez surely must be considering alterations here.
CLOSE!  Dembele whistles one just wide of the Portugal goal!
PORTUGAL SUBS! Semedo and Conceicao replace Cancelo and Fernandes for Portugal here.
Not sure about that Fernandes change? But Martinez knows more than me. Little under 15 minutes of normal time remaining here, and we are still 0-0.
Not too many risks being taken at the moment, which is not a surprise. A goal at this stage could be a winner.

Just a reminder that Spain are waiting in the semi-finals, with La Roja beating tournament hosts Germany 2-1 earlier this evening. I had a feeling this match would be a 0-0 and go all the way to penalties, and that is happening at the moment, but there is still plenty of football left to play.
YELLOW CARD!  Palhinha is booked for Portugal, and if his side make the semi-finals, he will be suspended.
Pass, pass, pass from France. Portugal are sitting in their shape.
It's Portugal's turn to enjoy possession of the ball. France are not overly concerned. This is the pattern at the moment.
YELLOW CARD!  Saliba is booked for fouling Conceicao just outside the France box.
Portugal have a free kick in a dangerous area here...
Ronaldo fires his free kick straight into the wall.
FRANCE SUB! Thuram enters the field in place of Kolo Muani.
This is going to extra time, isn't it? Little over two minutes of normal time remaining, and there will not be too much added time here. I predicted extra-time, and we are almost there.
SAVE!  Smart goalkeeping from Costa to keep out a long-range Kante effort.
SAVE!  Another comfortable save for Costa to deny Kante.
SHOT!  Saliba does brilliantly to block a strike from Bernardo!
Brilliant challenge from Pepe to deny Thuram inside the penalty box.
SHOT!  We are into the second of three additional minutes here. Mbappe has just curled one over the crossbar.
PORTUGAL SUB! Ruben Neves replaces Palhinha.
Almost over here. Extra time it will be.
SAVE!  Another smart save from Costa to keep out an effort from Mbappe.
END OF 90 MINUTES:  PORTUGAL 0-0 FRANCE
KICKOFF:  FRANCE SUB! Fofana enters the field for Camavinga.
Ronaldo was never coming off, was he? But he will be feeling his legs at this stage of proceedings.
CHANCE!  Huge chance for Ronaldo! That was the moment! Conceicao delivers into the penalty box, but Ronaldo fires over!
Portugal have a throw in French territory, but Semedo throws it back. No risks are being taken at the moment, which is not a shock.
SHOT!  Pepe has again been sensational tonight. He has just made another excellent block on Mbappe.
SHOT!  High and wide from Thuram. Not great it must be said.
France are just a little bit more purposeful going forward at the moment. Portugal are not really offering too much, with Ronaldo very isolated in the middle.
The pace of the match has dropped again, although Portugal are having more of the ball in the final third of the field. Not long left in the first half of extra time here.
SHOT!  Leao has a shot blocked inside the France box!
There has been some excellent defensive performances tonight, with Saliba and Pepe on opposite sides worth a mention. The duo have both been incredible.
SHOT!  Conceicao curls harmlessly over the France crossbar.
HALF TIME IN EXTRA TIME:  PORTUGAL 0-0 FRANCE
KICKOFF:  FRANCE SUB! Barcola replaces Mbappe here. PORTUGAL SUB: Felix enters the field for Leao.
Mbappe did not look comfortable all evening, and it does appear that he has signalled to Deschamps that he cannot continue. Ronaldo, though, will finish the game.
CHANCE!  Big moment! Felix, who has only just come on, heads into the side-netting at the far post. Again, it was really good work from the bright Conceicao.
The tension inside the stadium is incredible. Both sets of fans are nervous, you can sense it. A mistake now would be so costly, and both teams are sitting in their shapes.
SHOT!  Wild attempt from Dembele
line_type: as he fires over the crossbar.

commentary_text: Little over five minutes of extra time remaining here. Penalties will seemingly be needed to separate the two sides.
SHOT!  Barcola fires wide of the Portugal goal after breaking into the box. Good work to find the space, but the shot was disappointing.

I already feel nervous about the penalties. I did predict this, without going on about it. It had a 0-0 written all over it. Both managers are in deep conversation with their assistants, potentially discussing which players will take penalties. Or will there be late drama here?

I genuinely feel nervous about these upcoming penalties, not too sure why. Is Ronaldo going to score? As I mentioned earlier, Spain will not be concerned by anything that they have seen tonight, and they will be the favourites in the semi-final for me.
PORTUGAL SUB! Nunes replaces Vitinha for Portugal.
We're almost there. This one will require penalties.
SAVE!  Big save from Maignan to deny Mendes, could have been some finish!
FULL TIME:  PORTUGAL 0-0 FRANCE Penalty shootout!
Penalties are coming here. Incredible.
GOAL!  PORTUGAL 0-1 FRANCE Dembele sends France 1-0 ahead!
GOAL!  PORTUGAL 1-1 FRANCE Ronaldo levels the scores here, what a relief for him!
GOAL!  PORTUGAL 1-2 FRANCE Fofana down the middle to send France ahead!
GOAL!  PORTUGAL 2-2 FRANCE Bernardo makes it 2-2 with a brilliant effort!
GOAL!  PORTUGAL 2-3 FRANCE Kounde finds the top corner to make it 3-2 to France!
OFF THE POST!  PORTUGAL 2-3 FRANCE Felix hits the post!
GOAL!  PORTUGAL 2-4 FRANCE Barcola scores to send France 4-2 ahead!
GOAL!  PORTUGAL 3-4 FRANCE Mendes keeps Portugal in it!
GOAL!  PORTUGAL 3-5 FRANCE Hernandez wins it for France! Perfect penalties from the Blues!
FULL TIME:  PORTUGAL 0-0 FRANCE (FRANCE WIN 5-3 ON PENALTIES)
